selected_quotes: Research led by Prof. Ezekiel Emanuel shows #MOOCs are not yet reaching the disadvantaged
Survey from U Penn shows that MOOCs are taken by the wealthiest in developing countries
Nature has the first look at the results from our survey of students enrolled
Helping college-educated Americans get more education isn't exactly how some MOOCs pitch themselves UPenn
Majority of students on MOOCs are already well educated compared with the general population
